alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 3:56AM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHEAST KENTUCKY INTO SOUTH CENTRAL OHIO... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 064 Pickaway, Fire Weather Zone 065 Fairfield, Fire Weather Zone 073 Ross, Fire Weather Zone 074 Hocking, Fire Weather Zone 081 Adams, Fire Weather Zone 082 Pike, Fire Weather Zone 088 Scioto, Fire Weather Zone 099 Mason and Fire Weather Zone 100 Lewis. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.
